name: Geospin
description:
Spin the planet to save your city from being blown to smithereens!

Features
  • Local multiplayer versus spin-a-licious madness!
  • Supports 6+ players! (Tested with 6!)
  • Rockets!
  • Rumble!
  • You can play with your feet! (Probably!)
Credits ProgrammingJosh Powlison
Brian BogedinArtPaul PowlisonMusicEvan Bogedin
